pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculation of the Integrated Flow of Particles Between Polygons // Calculate the flow of particles between polygons by two integration methods: integration by a cubature method and integration on a grid of points. Annie Bouvier, Kien Kieu, Kasia Adamczyk and Herve Monod (2009) doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2008.11.006.
